abstract: To make 2009 far better — and much more profitable — experts offer the following New Year’s resolutions for your consideration.
snippet: To make 2009 far better — and much more profitable — experts offer the following New Year’s resolutions for your consideration.
lead_paragraph: Given the recession, stock market meltdown and declining corporate revenue (and earnings) just about everywhere, 2008 was a year most small-business owners would like to forget.

headline.main: Planning for a Happier New Year
headline.print_headline: Planning for a Happier New Year
